info.description: Retrieves valuation, holdings and transaction information on portfolios
info.title: API for portfolio holdings

get.description: Retrieves the list of overdue settlements based on the transaction reference, portfolio, broker and depository

parameters.name: portfolioId
parameters.description: Id of the portfolio or security account

parameters.name: transactionId
parameters.description: Unique transaction identifier for retrieving the details of the transaction. For example: FT0102030333 etc.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Identifier of the customer

parameters.name: brokerId
parameters.description: The identifier of the broker

parameters.name: tradeDate
parameters.description: Standard date field which records trade date of the account

parameters.name: valueDate
parameters.description: Indicates the value date on which the underlying accounting entry is to be given value (for interest purposes)

parameters.name: depository
parameters.description: The custodian where securities are held

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Indicates the type of currency to which the account belongs

parameters.name: instrumentId
parameters.description: The identifier of the instrument

parameters.name: deliveryInstruction
parameters.description: Type of Delivery to be made for this transaction. Allowed values: - DAP: Delivery Against Payment - FOP: Free of Payment

parameters.name: transactionType
parameters.description: Identifies the transaction type applicable to the transaction being processed, i.e. outward or inward payment. For example: ACPX, OTPX etc.

parameters.name: quantity
parameters.description: The nominal quantity

parameters.name: stockExchange
parameters.description: The stock exchange identifier

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

get.summary: Allows to view the outstanding and overdue settlement details
get.description: Allows to view the outstanding and overdue settlement details along with the delivery message information

parameters.name: transactionId
parameters.description: Unique transaction identifier for retrieving the details of the transaction. For example: FT0102030333 etc.

parameters.description: Indicates the type of currency to which the account belongs

parameters.name: instrumentId
parameters.description: The identifier of the instrument

parameters.name: deliveryInstruction
parameters.description: Type of Delivery to be made for this transaction. Allowed values: - DAP: Delivery Against Payment - FOP: Free of Payment

parameters.name: transactionType
parameters.description: Identifies the transaction type applicable to the transaction being processed, i.e. outward or inward payment. For example: ACPX, OTPX etc.

parameters.name: quantity
parameters.description: The nominal quantity

parameters.description: The stock exchange identifier

parameters.name: page_start

get.summary: Allows to view the settlement  details of the transaction pending to be settled
get.description: Allows to view the settlement  details of the transaction pending to be settled

parameters.name: securitySettlementsId
parameters.description: Identifier of the Security Settlement

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

put.summary: Allows to perform complete settlement on the transaction
put.description: Allows to perform complete settlement on the transaction

parameters.name: securitySettlementsId
parameters.description: Identifier of the Security Settlement

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

get.summary: Allows to view the settlement  details of the transaction pending to be settled
get.description: Allows to view the settlement  details of the transaction pending to be settled

parameters.name: securitySettlementsId
parameters.description: Identifier of the Security Settlement

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

put.summary: Allows to perform partial settlement on the transaction
put.description: Allows to perform partial settlement on the transaction

parameters.name: securitySettlementsId
parameters.description: Identifier of the Security Settlement

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

broker.description: Specifies the counterparty with whom the trade is to be effected.

brokerName.description: The name that is displayed for the broker

brokerOutstandingAmount.description: The amount outstanding for the broker

brokerOutstandingQuantity.description: The quantity of the instrument outstanding for the broker

transactionId.description: Unique transaction identifier for retrieving the details of the transaction. For example: FT0102030333 etc.

instrumentName.description: The name that is displayed for the instrument, taken from the Security Master

depository.description: The custodian where securities are held

depositoryName.description: The name that is displayed for the depository

tradeDate.description: Standard date field which records trade date of the account

valueDate.description: Indicates the value date on which the underlying accounting entry is to be given value (for interest purposes)

tradeCurrency.description: The trade currency is the settlement currency for the trade

portfolioId.description: Id of the portfolio or security account

portfolioName.description: The name that is displayed for the portfolio

accountCurrency.description: Currency of the account. For example: USD, GBP.

customerOutstandingAmount.description: The amount outstanding from/to the customer

customerOutstandingQuantity.description: The quantity outstanding from/to the customer

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

code.description: The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message caused by server

type.description: The identifier of error type: System

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

broker.description: Specifies the counterparty with whom the trade is to be effected.

brokerName.description: The name that is displayed for the broker

brokerOutstandingAmount.description: The amount outstanding for the broker

brokerOutstandingQuantity.description: The quantity of the instrument outstanding for the broker

transactionId.description: Unique transaction identifier for retrieving the details of the transaction. For example: FT0102030333 etc.

instrumentName.description: The name that is displayed for the instrument, taken from the Security Master

settled.description: Flag to indicate whether a bill is settled or not

depository.description: The custodian where securities are held

depositoryName.description: The name that is displayed for the depository

tradeDate.description: Standard date field which records trade date of the account

valueDate.description: Indicates the value date on which the underlying accounting entry is to be given value (for interest purposes)

tradeCurrency.description: The trade currency is the settlement currency for the trade

portfolioId.description: Id of the portfolio or security account

portfolioName.description: The name that is displayed for the portfolio

accountCurrency.description: Currency of the account. For example: USD, GBP.

customerOutstandingAmount.description: The amount outstanding from/to the customer

customerOutstandingQuantity.description: The quantity outstanding from/to the customer

deliveryInstruction.description: Type of Delivery to be made for this transaction. Allowed values: - DAP: Delivery Against Payment - FOP: Free of Payment

matchCode.description: Defines the status of settlement instruction for the incoming MT548 swift message. Sample values are 1. MTCH/MACH 2. IPRC/PACK

settlementStatus.description: Defines the status of the settlement for the incoming MT548 swift message.The values allowed are: Waiting : pending to receive settlement status update meaning pending to receive MT548 swift message,  Action required : awaiting action to be performed to get the final update on settlement status.Matched : transactions whose nominals have matched with the depository position

settlementFlag.description: Indicates if the transaction is fully settled or not.  Allowed Values are 1. YES - fully settled 2. NO - partially settled

recordStatus.description: General status of the record. Possible values: - null - authorised - IHLD - input, on hold - INAU - input, not authorised - INA2 - input, authorised, pending second authorisation - INAO - input, not authorised with blocking overrides - RNAU - reversed, not authorised - RNAO - reversed, not authorised with blocking overrides

code.description: The code related to override message.

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

brokerOutstandingQuantity.description: The quantity of the instrument outstanding for the broker

quantityToSettle.description: Quantity that has to be settled

quantityToCancel.description: Quantity that has to be cancelled

valueDate.description: Indicates the value date on which the underlying accounting entry is to be given value (for interest purposes)

brokerOutstandingAmount.description: The amount outstanding for the broker

amountToSettle.description: Indicates the amount that is being settled

amountValueDate.description: Value date on which the amount was settled/ unsettled

autoSettle.description: Indicates if the settlement is automatic at the Customer / Broker side

depositoryConfirmationKey.description: Contains the incoming MT544-547 Swift message reference

narrative.description: The additional text printed on descriptive statements in addition to the standard narrative and/or reference

portfolioId.description: Id of the portfolio or security account

customerOutstandingQuantity.description: The quantity outstanding from/to the customer

borrowAmountSettled.description: Borrow amount that is settled till date

borrowAmountToSettle.description: Borrow amount that is being settled

borrowAmountCancelled.description: The Customer borrow amount that is cancelled

borrowValueDate.description: Value date on which the borrow amount is settled/cancelled

lentAmountSettled.description: Customer lent amount that is settled till date

lentAmountOutstanding.description: Customer lent amount that is outstanding

lentAmountToSettle.description: Customer lent amount that is being settled

lentAmountCancelled.description: The customer lent amount that is cancelled

lentValueDate.description: Value date on which the customer lent amount is settled/cancelled

transactionCode.description: Identifies the system internal transaction code applicable to the transaction

depository.description: The custodian where securities are held

tradeDate.description: Standard date field which records trade date of the account

valueDate.description: Indicates the value date on which the underlying accounting entry is to be given value (for interest purposes)

tradeCurrency.description: The trade currency is the settlement currency for the trade

brokerAmount.description: Net amount due to/from the broker for the transaction. Applicable only where the security transfer is made against payment.

customerAmount.description: Total amount of cash to be debited from or credited to the customer

settled.description: Flag to indicate whether a bill is settled or not

quantityToSettle.description: Quantity that has to be settled

quantityToCancel.description: Quantity that has to be cancelled

brokerAmountCancelled.description: The broker amount that has been cancelled

generateInstruction.description: Specifies whether MT565 has to be generated

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique identifier/Message Reference of the record created.
